directions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.
title: Alexander

directions: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Americano

directions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass.
title: Angel Face

directions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
title: Aviation

directions: Shake together with ice. Strain into glass and serve
title: Bacardi cocktail

directions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
title: Between the Sheets

directions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.
title: Casino

directions: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.
title: Clover Club Cocktail

directions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.
title: Daiquiri

directions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint in the drink.
title: Derby

directions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.
title: Martini

served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Fizz

directions: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: John Collins

directions: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.
title: Manhattan

directions: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass
title: Mary Pickford

directions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
title: Monkey Gland

directions: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Negroni

directions: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Old Fashioned

directions: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.
title: Paradise

directions: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Planter's Punch

directions: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve
title: Porto flip

served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Fizz

directions: Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with a lemon twist. Serve.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Rusty Nail

directions: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.[1]
title: Sazerac

directions: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Screwdriver

directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.
title: Sidecar

directions: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass. May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.
title: Stinger

directions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.
title: Tuxedo

directions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Whiskey sour

directions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.
title: Sour

directions: Pour peach puree into chilled flute, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.
title: Bellini

directions: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Black Russian

directions: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Bloody Mary

directions: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with crushed ice and add the Cachaca.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Caipirinha

directions: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by gently pouring chilled champagne. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.
title: Champagne cocktail

directions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel.
title: Cosmopolitan

directions: Build all ingredients in a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Cuba Libre

directions: Combine Cognac, syrup, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass. Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.
title: French 75

directions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: French Connection

directions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Godfather

directions: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into glass and serve.
title: Golden dream

directions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
title: Grasshopper

directions: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Harvey Wallbanger

directions: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Horse's Neck

directions: Heat the coffee, whiskey and sugar; do not boil. Pour into glass and top with cream; serve hot.
title: Irish coffee

directions: Add the creme de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.
title: Kir

directions: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon spiral. Serve with straw. [1]
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Long Island Iced Tea

directions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Mai Tai

directions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Margarita

directions: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.
title: Mimosa

directions: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Mint julep

directions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Mojito

directions: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime slice and sprig of mint on the brim of the copper mug.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Moscow mule

directions: Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.
title: Pina colada

directions: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass. Garnish and serve.
title: Rose

directions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Sea Breeze

directions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Sex on the Beach

directions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.
title: Singapore Sling

directions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Stir gently to create the sunrise effect. Garnish and serve.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Tequila Sunrise

directions: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.
title: B-52

directions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and sugar syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.
title: Bramble

directions: In a highball glass filled with ice add 6cl dark rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Dark 'N' Stormy

directions: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.
title: Martini

directions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass
title: Espresso Martini

directions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
title: French Martini

directions: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.
title: Kamikaze

directions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.
title: Lemon Drop

directions: Vigorously shake and strain contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then pour into glass and garnish with bitters.[1]
title: Pisco sour

directions: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Spritz (alcoholic beverage)

directions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.
served: On the rocks; poured over ice
title: Margarita

directions: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.
title: Vesper

directions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass
title: Yellow Bird
